data.message: This new layout is quite uncomfortable and too primitive. If you could get the old one back that would be great :)

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback Fernando! We're constantly working to make our products better. Is there something from the last version that you miss the most? Let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1lXp1bJ - Kristen
It will be nicer if the ads were a bit smaller =____=;;
absolutely correct,if wanna have a look like on a smartphone,i will use my smartphone,on my pc desktop i wanna see the full screen,not only in the middle..this looks very confused...

There seems to be less real content to the left and middle and a lot more junk at the right side of the page. The font/color scheme also seems really stark. I am finding it quite hard on my eyes and not very readable.
I wish you could delete feeds from friends, especially political opinions.
It's all squished up on the right and left, with not much room in the middle for reality of posts.
